title: What is it like to work with Leif Babin? - Quora
tags: What Is It Like to Work With Y?

response.answer_text: Nobody here has ever served with Leif Babin, apart from a possible 2000 people, who possibly never even use Quora and possibly never met him. But from stories I've heard of from Extreme Ownership by both him and Jocko Willink, it was legendary. They both are former SEALs and are incredible warriors. It would be a blast to ever fight with them.
